channel.title: Training on Melio Consulting
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Melio Consulting

item.title: Pricing
item.description: .background { padding: 0 25px 25px; position: relative; width: 100%; } .background::after { content: ''; background: #f7964c; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f7964c 0%, #e97d29 100%); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f7964c 0%,#e97d29 100%); background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f7964c 0%,#e97d29 100%); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#f7964c', endColorstr='#e97d29',GradientType=0 ); height: 350px; left: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 1; } @media (min-width: 1300px) { .background { padding: 0 0 25px; } } .container { margin: 0 auto; padding: 50px 0 0; max-width: 960px; width: 100%; } .
